att.gaijiProp

provides attributes for defining the properties of non-standard characters or glyphs. [5 Characters, Glyphs, and Writing Modes]
Modulegaiji â€” Character and glyph documentation
MemberslocalProp unicodeProp unihanProp
Attributes
@name
provides the name of the character or glyph property being defined.
Usage
req
Datatype
teidata.xmlName
@value
provides the value of the character or glyph property being defined.
Usage
req
Datatype
teidata.text
@version
specifies the version number of the Unicode Standard in which this property name is defined.
Usage
opt
Datatype
